name: SCNParticleModifierBlock
desc: The signature for blocks called by SceneKit to modify particle properties on each frame of simulation, used by the addModifier(forProperties:at:modifier:) method.
declaration: typealias SCNParticleModifierBlock = (UnsafeMutablePointer<UnsafeMutableRawPointer>, UnsafeMutablePointer<Int>, Int, Int, Float) -> Void
